name: You Are What You Eat (atasfun)
description:
You Are What You Eat is an endless runner game, where the goal is to eat as many creatures as possible before dying. Starting as a generic slime, you become what you eat and gain new abilities. But be careful, what’s edible to you depends on what characteristics you currently have.

The Android and iOS versions of this game will be available on their respective app stores soon, stay tuned!

This game can be played with a Lioness! Please see:

  • https://allison-liem.medium.com/using-biofeedback-in-my-video-game-10919875976a
  • https://www.engadget.com/you-are-what-you-eat-lioness-smart-vibrator-game-223046404.html

For the Lioness edition:

  • Google Play store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.AtasFun.YouAreWhatYouEatLioness
  • Apple app store: https://apps.apple.com/app/you-are-what-you-eat-lioness/id1606126480
